Header: Anura Kumara Dissanayake points out the presidential election period is a generous season
Content: Presidential Candidate of the National Peoples Power Anura Kumara Dissanayake says that he sees the presidential election period similar to the Christmas season. He was addressing a public rally at Kegalle. The public rally to ensure the victory of Mr. Anura Kumara Dissanayake was held on the Nidahas Mawatha in Kegalle. Kegalle district leader of the National Peoples Power Gamini Rathnayake organized the rally. Presidential Candidate Anura Kumara Dissanayake said that when the presidential candidates meet the farmers they will say fertilizer will be given free of charge. The other person says fertilizer will be given free of charge not only for paddy but for other crops as well. When they meet graduates they say that employment will be given. When they meet fishermen they say a subsidy will be given for diesel. He pointed out over the years rulers of this country have given similar pledges to the people during election time. He said that the rulers have always sold the poverty of the people.
